game.name: Bubba Yuga
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: Bubba Yuga is a 2-player couch co-op puzzle game based on the Slavic folktales of the Baba Yaga. Playing as a pair of tied together witches, you and a friend must work together with your walking house to capture all the woodland children and break the curse that’s been placed upon your family.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bubba Yuga is a 2-player couch co-op puzzle game based on the Slavic folktales of the Baba Yaga. Playing as a pair of tied together witches, you and a friend must work together with your walking house to capture all the woodland children and break the curse that’s been placed upon your family.
game.developers: Wanli Lu, Xinyan Wang, Yang Zhang, Rishabh Anand, Wanyi Tao, Yifu Ding, Flora Liu, Rachel Clark, Evelyn Zhang, Wentao Yang, Ven Ferlin, Mingyu Yang, Murong Jing, Alex Ingram, Wyatt Getzen
